sentences.en: A wheel revolves round its axis.
It has been predicted that the Earth will tilt on its axis , causing catastrophic famine and disease.
sentences.cn: 有人曾预言地球会导致大荒灾和疾病.

sentences.en: Pressure - compensated air bearings are used on both ends of the trunnion axis.
sentences.cn: 耳轴两端各用一压力补偿空气轴承.

sentences.en: The axis of a circle is its diameter.
The boat pivoted on its central axis and pointed straight at the harbour entrance.
sentences.cn: 小船原地掉过头来，直指海港入口。

sentences.en: the daily rotation of the earth on its axis
The earth revolves both round the sun and on its own axis.
The Earth rotates on an axis between the north and south poles.
sentences.cn: 地球绕着南北两极之间的地轴自转。

sentences.en: The earth rotates on its axis once every 24 hours.
sentences.cn: 地球每24小时依其轴心自转一次.

sentences.en: The Earth spins on its own axis.
The earth whirls on its axis.
The earth's axis is the line between the North and South Poles.
sentences.cn: 地轴是南北极之间的线.

sentences.en: The higher - order terms arise from nonlinearities and cross - axis sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 高次项是由外线性和轴间耦合灵敏度所产生的.

sentences.en: the vertical axis of the graph
Using astigmatic method to extract information of light source in z axis.
sentences.cn: 用散光的方法来提取光源在Z轴上的位置。

sentences.en: You can also change the units on the Y-axis.
sentences.cn: 您还可以更改Y轴上的单位。

trans.tran_en: the imaginary line around which a large round object, such as the Earth, turns
